Sentencas: Lowering the operating temperatures of solid-oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) is critical, although achieving success in this endeavor has proven challenging.
Titulo: An excellent bismuth-doped perovskite cathode with high activity and CO2 resistance for solid-oxide fuel cells operating below 700 degree celsius

Sentencas: Herein, Bi0.15Sr0.85Co0.8Fe0.2O3-delta (BiSCF) is systematically evaluated as a carbon dioxide (CO2)-tolerant and highly active cathode for SOFCs.
Titulo: An excellent bismuth-doped perovskite cathode with high activity and CO2 resistance for solid-oxide fuel cells operating below 700 degree celsius

Titulo: An excellent bismuth-doped perovskite cathode with high activity and CO2 resistance for solid-oxide fuel cells operating below 700 degree celsius

Sentencas: Moreover, BiSCF exhibits long-term stability over a period of 500 h, and an anode-supported cell with BiSCF achieves a power density of 912 mW cm(-2) at 650 degrees C.
Titulo: An excellent bismuth-doped perovskite cathode with high activity and CO2 resistance for solid-oxide fuel cells operating below 700 degree celsius

Sentencas: The CO2-poisoned BiSCF exhibits quick reversibility or slight activation after returning to normal conditions.
Titulo: An excellent bismuth-doped perovskite cathode with high activity and CO2 resistance for solid-oxide fuel cells operating below 700 degree celsius

Sentencas: The exceptional CO2 tolerance of BiSCF can be attributed to its reduced basicity and high electronegativity, which effectively restrict surface Sr diffusion and hinder subsequent carbonate formation.
Titulo: An excellent bismuth-doped perovskite cathode with high activity and CO2 resistance for solid-oxide fuel cells operating below 700 degree celsius

Sentencas: These findings highlight the substantial potential of BiSCF for SOFCs operating below 700 degrees C.
Titulo: An excellent bismuth-doped perovskite cathode with high activity and CO2 resistance for solid-oxide fuel cells operating below 700 degree celsius
